data.sentence: The word لَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to obey, permit/consent, obedience, to do voluntarily, do an act with effort. istaa'a - to be able, have power, be capable of.
data.sentence: The word يَسْتَطِيعُونَ comes from the root ط و ع and is associated with the meanings: to obey, permit/consent, obedience, to do voluntarily, do an act with effort. istaa'a - to be able, have power, be capable of.

data.meanings: To be present, present at, stand in presence of, hurt, be at hand.
data.sentence: The word مُحْضَرُونَ comes from the root ح ض ر and is associated with the meanings: To be present, present at, stand in presence of, hurt, be at hand.
The word نَصْرَهُمْ comes from the root ن ص ر and is associated with the meanings: to assist/aid, succour, protect.

data.meanings: Collect or assemble [armies, military forces], prepare an army, Jundun [collected body of men prepared for war; auxiliaries].
data.sentence: The word جُنْدٌ comes from the root ج ن د and is associated with the meanings: Collect or assemble [armies, military forces], prepare an army, Jundun [collected body of men prepared for war; auxiliaries].
